episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a range of quirky and historical facts, including the prevalence of cyborgs in Sweden, Queen Elizabeth I's precautions against poisoned underwear, the luxurious care of polo horses by a world champion, and the extreme measures taken to prevent 'Game of Thrones' spoilers.

facts.fact: Queen Elizabeth I's ladies in waiting would try on her underwear every morning to make sure it hadn't been poisoned.
The world champion polo player builds swimming pools for his horses whenever they get injured.
To prevent spoilers getting out, some Game of Thrones scripts were built to self-detonate.
